archimate:BusinessEvent.name: We spend money on ideas that do not make business sense
archimate:BusinessEvent.documentation:
Often, we have seen products and services that are born from us focusing on cool technologies or things we like. Many projects are run without fully understanding our value proposition or having a good plan for how to capitalize on the technology.
Serious questions need to be asked - not only about the technology and skilling, but also around the potential market, the profitability, whether we can bring things to market on time, if we can legally achieve it, operate it... and so on. there are requirements in the baseline to address such things and mechanisms such as TELOS architects are supposed to apply.
Where we donâ€™t properly do design or follow a methodology people are free to spend money on very questionable solutions.
